title: A Vacation For Everyone With A Tribal Tattoo: MÖTLEY CRÜE & DEF LEPPARD Announce Destination Festival
description: Happening in Mexico. The post A Vacation For Everyone With A Tribal Tattoo: MÖTLEY CRÜE & DEF LEPPARD Announce Destination Festival appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
text: Mötley Crüe and Def Leppard have teamed up for a brand-new destination festival in Riviera Maya, Mexico. The festival is called Rock The Tides, it's happening in November 2025, and unfortunately you will have to see Mötley Crüe live if you're attending. Sorry in advance. Def Leppard is excellent, though. The rest of the lineup is: Bret Michaels Extreme The Struts Buckcherry Dorothy Living Colour Moon Walker Velvet Daydream "Mexico has always been one of the most electric places we've played – the energy is just unreal," said Mötley Crüe in a statement about the festival Rolling Stone. "Some of our most unforgettable shows have happened there, and we know this one will be no different. We're excited to head back, team up with Def Leppard, and throw one hell of a party for everyone making the trip. It’s going to be an epic night." Tickets for the festival are available here. And for an extra $100, you get shielded from having to see Vince Neil in a Speedo. Want More Metal? The festival is called Rock The Tides, it's happening in November 2025, and unfortunately you will have to see Mötley Crüe live if you're attending. Sorry in advance. Def Leppard is excellent, though. The rest of the lineup is:

  • Bret Michaels
  • Extreme
  • The Struts
  • Buckcherry

"Mexico has always been one of the most electric places we've played – the energy is just unreal," said Mötley Crüe in a statement about the festival Rolling Stone. We're excited to head back, team up with Def Leppard, and throw one hell of a party for everyone making the trip. It’s going to be an epic night."

Tickets for the festival are available here. And for an extra $100, you get shielded from having to see Vince Neil in a Speedo.
